name: Magnetico: Bomb Master 3D
description:
Cyborgs are among us! Who will save the world and protect the humanity from their attacks? Show your courage and bravery! Defeat them all in an epic Magnetico: Bomb Master 3D game!

It’s your chance to challenge yourself and conquer all the bad guys on your way to glory in Magnetico: Bomb Master 3D! You need to throw magnetic bombs at your enemies and destroy them all at once within a blow! Prove your professional skills and show the cyborgs who is the hero and the best bomb master in the world! The horde of cyborgs will attack you during the game. Charge your magnets, aim, and hit the assassins. Create various combinations of attacks to beat’em all.

There are many in-game items to crush the criminals. Interact with the environment to make the perfect hit. Be attentive and look sharp 'cause the assassins can appear out of nowhere!

GAME FEATURES:
- Action-packed game
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Many difficult tasks requiring accuracy & quick reflexes
- Intuitive controls
- Simple interface

Don’t forget, there are many enemies of different size and level. The criminals are fearless and well-armed, so they will attack you all at once and try to defeat you immediately! But that will not scare the best bomb master, right?

Be brave and save the world, get to the finish, and become the ultimate hero!

Magnetico: Bomb Master 3D is free-to-play, but it has some in-game items to purchase.

Well, what are you waiting for? Download the game now – it's time to destroy them all, agent!
